thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our trip with our granddaughter
thread.title_full: Our trip with our granddaughter - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mary Jo A
title: Our trip with our granddaughter
text: this was a great hotel. Perfect location, near the square but quiet. Central for everything. Lobby is old world elegant, and the rooms have been refurbished. Plenty of space for three people. Some things that are important to us are: shower, light, control over heat and cooling and places to put our stuff. On all of these counts this gets an excellent. The staff was uniformly extremely pleasant and helpful. The young man who checked us in went out of his way to help us, and Luigi helped us find restaurants, made reservations, and helped us with directions.
